page.title: 04GLYNDE PLACE
page.content: We went into{Glynde Place.}The first things we saw were two paintings. The paintings were of Queen Charlotte and George III. There was a shop in Glynde Place. My favourite room was the{Upper Hall {and I saw a silver}figurine of Queen Victoria on a silver tray. The silver tray had men's heads engraved on it. My second favourite room had{Welsh {costumes}in it. There was also a gold christening gown. In the{library}there were some window-panes with names scratched on them with a diamond. On the landing we saw a portrait of the{Trevor family. {In the dining room}there was an oak floor with a table with gold things on it. { The Gateway}is a tower with a blue dome and a ball on top.
